suggest.amasty\/module-mixin-rewrite-patch: Install mixin rewrite patch if you have a problem with extension on Magento 2.4.2 version on Checkout
suggest.amasty\/module-delivery-date-manager-mft: Install module-delivery-date-manager-mftf-2 module to be able to run Delivery Date Manager MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
Install module-delivery-date-manager-mftf-3 module to be able to run Delivery Date Manager MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
